author: Simon Difford
description: A classic Mojito with a hint of berry fruit flavour and colour
name: French Mojito
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly MUDDLE mint in base of glass (just to bruise)
Half-fill glass with crushed ice and CHURN (stir) with bar spoon
Continue to add crushed ice and churn until drink is level with glass rim
